name: Globe Savers
description:
Globe Saver is a scoring game about recycling trashes and ecology sensibilization

The rules are simple:

  • If you miss the trash can you lose 1 life
  • If you successfully launch the detritus into a trash can you win 1 point and save the world for 5 more seconds
  • If you successfully launch the detritus into the appropriate trash can you win 3 points and save the world for 10 more seconds

The game has been made for the CUJV 1Game Jam N°1 during the saturday 17th february 2018.

Changelog:

  • Pre Alpha 0.0.3: Fix HighScore
